segments.text: Good afternoon . I'll show you to your room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me which bags are yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're over there next to the door . Those three with green tags on them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you wait a moment ? I have to get a trolley . May I see your room key , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Room 402 . You're on the 4th floor . This way , please .
segments.speaker: S1
